name: BGText
short_description:
BGText is ment for youtube tutorials. where you need to have text and you record it from notepad, it doesen't look quite cool! But with this software you will get a set of backgrounds for your text editor yoy can record for your video! 

There is a huge background library available, and for each new version there will be more backgrounds!
With the upcomming website there will be a background request for people who wants a special background!

NOTE: Before you give a request check the library and the versions coming soon page to see which backgrounds is under work!
summary: BGText is a text editor with the ability to change background.
